text: Matrix protein (M) has been researched as an essential VLP forming component, especially M1 part has been reported that induces broad range of cross-reactivity and can incorporate different subtype HA protein or NA protein, resulting in mixed influenza VLPs, and can provide protection against influenza viruses of different subtypes [36, 38, 39] . Therefore, we here investigated mixed VLP forming combination of M1 gene from H5 strain (A/chicken/Vietnam/ OIE-2215/2012) with full length of HA and NA genes from H1 strain (A/CA/04/2009) and constructed a VLP-forming, gene-delivering, HERV encoated-baculovirus (AcHERV-VLP) that essentially kills two birds with one stone.
